title: Simulation-Based Medical Education Design: Iterative Alpha/Beta Testing Process

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers; simulation-based medical scenario design education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners apply three criteria to evaluate the realism (Reality) of simulation scenario designs.
Learners can identify and improve five key issues that may arise during the simulation protocol modification process.
Learners can implement three strategies for effective communication during the role allocation and introduction phase.
Learners can analyze alpha/beta test results to derive core improvement areas in scenario design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
